decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Operational Management Plan, Servicing, Deliveries & Waste Management Plan, Planning Statement, Unnumbered Promotional/Marketing Brochures (x6; including two specific to B.7), Design & Access Statement, 1788-JRA-00-ZZ-DR-A-0001 (P02), 1788-JRA-00-ZZ-DR-A-0000(P02) and 1788-JRA-B7-ZZ-DR-A-0051(P01), 1788-JRA-B7-ZZ-DR-A-0052(P02) [received on 5 December 2018], and Cover Letter and Planning Statement Addendum [received on 5 February 2019]) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The flexible A1/A3 use hereby permitted shall not be carried on outside the following times: 6am-9pm on Monday-Friday; 9am-5pm on Saturday.

Condition : 5 - Prior to the first beneficial use of the development 
hereby approved, full details (including manufacturers specifications and access to the storage area) of secure-covered long- and short-stay cycle parking facilities (for not less than 4 bicycles) for the users of the development must be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The approved facilities shall be fully implemented and made available for use before the first occupation of the development and thereafter retained for use at all times without obstruction.
description: Change of use to part of the ground floor from Office (B1) to flexible use as restaurants and cafes (A1/A3), with associated fenestration changes including the installation of three new external access points.
